creditline: Gift of Henry White Cannon Jr.,Class of 1910, in memory of his Father

texts.textentryhtml: Pope Clement XII (1758-1769) Rezzonico, Venice. [Adolphe] Genovesi (?-?), Venice, by 1891; Purchased from him by Jean-Paul Richter (1847-1937) in 1891; Purchased from him by Henry White Cannon (1850-1934) in Florence on March 10, 1906; By descent to his son, Henry (Harry) W. Cannon, Jr. (1887-1966), Class of 1910; Donated to the Museum in 1935
